alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webb County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, or near Laredo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Texas A&M, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park, St Augustine High School South Laredo, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Ranchos Penitas West, Orvil and Callaghan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 33. US Highway 83 between mile markers 682 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
